information: Find Crystallite Clusters underground by listening out for their sparkle!
They spawn rarely between y=-48 and y=46.
They do not spawn above y=0 in oceans.
Mine the Crystallite Blocks with a §lNetherite Pickaxe§r or better.
Each block drops 1 Crystallite Shards item, which can be used to craft Gems for crafting tools & armor.
